name: Cycling from Saigon - Sadec - CanTho 3Days
description: Mekong Delta Cycling Tours. This bicycle tour will take you to a former Viet Cong base in a mangrove forest. Then you will have a chance to visit Sadec, the oldest town in the Mekong Delta. Leave Saigon for the Delta in the morning, enjoy two hours driving south on the freeway to Tieng Giang province. Visit the Viet Cong base in Dong Thap. Sedec town can not to be missed. It was featured in the Hollywood movie The Lover, with Margueti Duras, set in Sadec from 1928 to 1932, in which a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man. Road surfaces: paths & trails.
